file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-32-10-06 - RESONATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RESONATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the permitted limits for damage to the resonator. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU PERMITTED LIMITS FOR DAMAGE TO 53-32-10-200-801-A EXHAUST SILENCER RESONATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-32-10 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-32-10-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU EXHAUST SILENCER 2. PERMITTED LIMITS FOR DAMAGE TO RESONATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK A. General (1) This task gives the permitted limits for damage to the resonator. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 53-32-00-000-801-A/400 TAIL CONE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-32-00-400-801-A/400 TAIL CONE - INSTALLATION HSPS CMM 49-80-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task AR I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU EXHAUST SILENCER (1) Remove the tail cone. Refer to AMM TASK 53-32-00-000-801-A/400. J. Resonator - Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU EXHAUST SILENCER (1) Make a detailed inspection on the resonator for damage (Figure 601). (2) If the resonator is damaged, refer to Table 601 to know if damage is permitted or not. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 53-32-10 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL Table 601 - PERMITTED LIMITS FOR DAMAGE TO RESONATOR Maximum Maximum Maximum Maximum Di- Depth mm Length mm Width mm ameter mm (in.) (in.) (in.) (in.) Dents and defor- 6.35 (0.25) 101.6 (4.0) 76.2 (3.0) N/A mation Cracks and Tears N/A 25.4 (1.0) 1.52 (0.06) N/A Holes N/A N/A N/A 12.7 (0.50) (3) If the damage is in the limits given in Table 601, no action or treatment is necessary and the aircraft can be dispatched. (4) Damage that is out of the limits given in Table 601 must be repaired. Refer to HSPS CMM 49-80-01 as necessary or replace all the exhaust silencer. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU EXHAUST SILENCER (1) Install the tail cone. Refer to AMM TASK 53-32-00-400-801-A/400.
